name: Forever Lost (AveragePerson22)
description:
Go from room to room slaying enemies and killing bosses, there is no exit, but you always come back for them.

This is an isometric game about endless rooms. Clean a room of enemies and proceed to the next one. There are two bosses who will show up randomly. You can choose between a pistol and a sword as your weapon. Leave your thoughts below!

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

Right button click to dash

Left button click to attack/shoot

M to turn music on/off

J to turn auto shoot on/off
